flawed_nl_solution:
He gets his pool cleaned 30/3=<<30/3=10>>10 times a month
Each time he gets it cleaned he tips 150*0.1=$<<150*0.1=15>>15
So he pays 150+15=$<<150+15=163>>163
So he pays 163*10=$<<163*10=1630>>1630 a month on cleaning
The chemicals cost 200*2=$<<200*2=400>>400
So in total, he pays 1630+400=$<<1630+400=2030>>2030

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 165.0, not 163.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
